fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.api.forward_chaining

Interface RuleApplier<R extends Rule,A extends AtomSet>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DirectRuleApplier<R,A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRuleApplier, DefaultRuleApplier, ExhaustiveRuleApplier, RestrictedChaseRuleApplier

    public interface RuleApplier<R extends Rule,A extends AtomSet>
extends DirectRuleApplier<R,A>
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA) <clement@6pi.fr>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean apply(R rule, A atomSet)
      Apply the given Rule over the given AtomSet, the new atoms are directly added into the AtomSet.
      CloseableIterator<Atom> delegatedApply(R rule, A atomSet)
      Apply the given Rule over the given AtomSet, the new generated atoms are returned as a CloseableIterator.
      CloseableIterator<Atom> delegatedApply(R rule, A atomSetOnWichQuerying, A atomSetOnWichCheck)
      Apply the given Rule over atomSetOnWichQuerying, the redundancy of the generated atoms will be checked over atomSetOnWichCheck.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

              A atomSet)
       throws RuleApplicationException
        Apply the given Rule over the given AtomSet, the new atoms are directly added into the AtomSet.

      • delegatedApply

        CloseableIterator<Atom> delegatedApply(R rule,
                                       A atomSet)
                                throws RuleApplicationException
        Apply the given Rule over the given AtomSet, the new generated atoms are returned as a CloseableIterator.

        Returns:
        An CloseableIterator over new generated atoms by the rule application.

      • delegatedApply

        CloseableIterator<Atom> delegatedApply(R rule,
                                       A atomSetOnWichQuerying,
                                       A atomSetOnWichCheck)
                                throws RuleApplicationException
        Apply the given Rule over atomSetOnWichQuerying, the redundancy of the generated atoms will be checked over atomSetOnWichCheck. The new generated atoms are returned as a CloseableIterator.
        Parameters:
        rule -
        atomSetOnWichQuerying -
        atomSetOnWichCheck -
        Returns:
        An CloseableIterator over new generated atoms by the rule application.
        Throws:
        RuleApplicationException
